title: Mobile-Based Civic Education Character Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and general comprehension of citizenship education
context.additional_context: Operating microlearning modules for developing five core citizenship values (kindness/honesty/hygiene/religious values/artistic sensibility) in mobile environments for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform situation-based conversation simulations applying the 5S principles (smile/greeting/etiquette) via mobile platforms with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve their honest decision-making skills by over 75% through an integrity assessment game (virtual cafeteria management) in digital environments.
Learners can design environments meeting at least 3 out of 4 cleanliness evaluation criteria in a hygiene management VR module.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
